Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. Specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. The following characters can be used: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. Specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. The following characters can be used: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. Specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:.  The following characters can be used: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. Specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:.  The following characters can be used: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: MessageTtlSeconds
properties.description: The period of time a signaling channel retains undelivered messages before they are discarded.

type.description: The period of time a signaling channel retains undelivered messages before they are discarded.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the Kinesis Video Signaling Channel.

type.description: The name of the Kinesis Video Signaling Channel.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The type of the Kinesis Video Signaling Channel to create. Currently, SINGLE_MASTER is the only supported channel type.

type.description: The type of the Kinesis Video Signaling Channel to create. Currently, SINGLE_MASTER is the only supported channel type.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Kinesis Video Signaling Channel.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Kinesis Video Signaling Channel.
